jump_scares.spoiler: The handcuffed patient lunges forward in the bed

An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help

An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo

As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
A dog jumps at the car window and barks
Jack jumps at Bess to scare her
Amber suddenly slips into the hole and screams
A tree branch suddenly flies through the window and breaks it after Jack says “That’s why I come on when you least expect it.

As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground

An emergency vehicle rushes past

The camera pans back to Jonathan. A zombie screams beside Him

Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
Herbert yells “Boo!

David knocks on the car window, startling Jade

Chucky hits Tiffany over the head with a spade

Shelly lunges at another student in the playground

Wade bursts into the staff room, startling the other teachers

A teacher appears from around a corner

There is some loud banging as the children attempt to break into the room where the teachers are hiding

The vending machine makes a noise, causing the nearby infected child to scream

Loud sound

During a tense scene, Chris closes a door to reveal Rose is watching him

As Chris goes to leave, Jeremy runs up and grabs him from behind

While hiding from Mark, Ed turns around and runs straight into Jerry

A flying skeletal monster jumps out at Roger

A car suddenly crashes into the back of Kylie’s car
The driver of the white car walks up to Kylie’s window, accompanied with a loud musical sting
The computer that Kylie’s using, short-circuits
The freezer makes a mechanical noise, startling Kylie
A statue of Jesus wrapped in a white sheet stumbles and falls towards Kylie
After Kylie’s ankle bracelet beeps, grabbing her attention, a diseased-looking hand comes out from under a piece of furniture and grabs her leg
While she’s in the shower, Kylie crouches and is then attacked by the possessed teddy bear, accompanied by a loud musical sting
Graham startles Kylie while she’s dancing
The lights come back on and a veiled figure suddenly appears besides Dennis, accompanied by a loud musical stinger
While Amos is trying to look through the presumed killer’s window, Kylie suddenly opens it from inside, startling Amos in the process, accompanied by a musical stinger
The flash from Amos’s camera reveals the presumed killer’s silhouette standing behind a window, staring at Amos. This is accompanied by a loud musical stinger
The burned teddy bear in the back of Amos’s car suddenly starts to speak and startles him, accompanied by a musical stinger
Eugene slams into the door of the pick-up truck just as Kylie closes it. Accompanied by a musical stinger
Kylie turns around and Miriam suddenly appears in front of her
A sudden scene transition from a silent scene to Kylie loudly and violently opening a kitchen shelf may startle some viewers
Dennis suddenly goes on the attack, accompanied by a musical stinger
Miriam opens a cupboard in the bathroom and Eugene stumbles out of it, prompting both of them to scream. Close-up on Miriam’s face as she’s screaming. Accompanied by a musical stinger
After stabbing Eugene through the wall, Dennis suddenly kicks down the wall
Dennis suddenly comes out of frame and punches Kylie unconscious
After a few seconds of droning sounds as the camera zooms in on the saleswoman, there is a sudden clinking noise that causes her to flinch

Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera cuts to a close up of two bodies with Jack-o’-lantern heads

Something rams the boat, startling its passengers

movies.title: Scream 6
directors: Matt Bettinelli and Olpin Tyler Gillett

jump_scares.spoiler: After a moment of silence, children scream at a distance, startling Laura

Billy is suddenly standing behind Max, Nancy, and Chris

movies.title: The Return of the Living Dead

jump_scares.spoiler: While a person is contacting the police on the phone, a zombie jumps through the window
Fiona looks up and screams suddenly
During a flashback, a sock puppet briefly appears on screen accompanied by an electronic noise that may startle some viewers

When Eddie tries to meditate a loud noise from the neighbors bothers him
A screaming lady runs into eddie
Eddie looks in the mirror and a voice says eddie and his eyes become black
Venom suddenly says FOOD when eddie is on the phone
Eddie reacts violently when the MRI Scan starts
Another mild jumpscare when Venom suddenly says HUNGRY
Eddie is bothered by the neighbour again and when the neighbour said “whatever” Eddie suddenly roars at him with a scary face
When Dan says we don’t got a lot of time, venom suddenly grabs him by the neck
When Carlton drake says “This is the last time I’m asking you where is my symbiote,” he suddenly transforms to Riot shout WHERE IS HE
